name: SWOLE CALIBER
description:
Long ago, a snake dreams of competing at the MAXIMUM CAPACITY of personal fitness, but he can't do it without YOUR help.

Inspired by Rhythm Heaven, QWOP and....?

Made for Train Jam 2016 by Rob and Jordan

We will be updating this game with things like "structure" and "playability", soon.

"...you are a snake, but the swole still burns"
